[[Solar TV]] (2009-2011)| former_callsigns = DXAQ-TV (1967-1972)| effective_radiated_power = | homepage = [http://www.rpn9.com/ www.rpn9.com]| }} '''DXKO-TV''', channel 5, is a television station of [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] [[Radio Philippines Network]]. Its studios are located at Gusa, Cagayan De Oro City. ==Current on-air staff== * Jonas Bustamante == See also == * [[Radio Philippines Network]] {{Cagayan De Oro TV}} {{RPN Mindanao}} {{Philippines-tv-stub}} [[Category:Television stations in Cagayan de Oro City]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 1953]] [[Category:Television stations in the Philippines]] [[Category:RPN stations]] [[Category:Radio Philippines Network]] [[ceb:DXKO-TV]]
